message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.SD, cs.LG 

This paper discusses the challenges and limitations of human-machine interaction through spoken language, which is a topic that falls under the sub-categories of human-computer interaction (cs.HC), natural language processing (cs.CL), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), software engineering (cs.SD), and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper specifically focuses on the design of future speech-based human-machine interaction, which is a key area of research in these sub-categories. Therefore, cs.HC and cs.CL are the most likely sub-categories, followed by cs.AI, cs.SD, and cs.LG.
